author: David Osborne
description: With a whole measure of watermelon syrup, you may expect this cocktail to be on the sweet side. Instead, it is beautifully balanced with delicate Jalapeño heat – at least it is if you go easy with the amount of Jalapeño you infuse in your pisco.
name: Purpurina Cocktail

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
